item.description:
Active Child are bringing their synths, harps, and falsettos to Brighton Music Hall this Saturday, along with the once witch house-affiliated co-headliner Balam Acab. I've seen Active Child before and they put on a good live show, good songs to try out include "Hanging On," "Playing House," and "Wilderness." I don't know Balam Acab as well, but "Regret Making Mistakes" stands out.
Anyways, let's meet at Big City before the show at 7:30 (138 Brighton Ave, the next block over from the venue), and we can head over before the opener goes on stage at 9.
Opener Superhumanoids
Doors at 8 PM; Show at 9 PM; 18+ Show
Advance Box Office Price $12
item.how_to_find_us: Big City - From the street entrance, take the stairs on the right up, and then take a left at the top of the stairs. At Brighton Music Hall, will hang out at the bar on the left, close to the stage for the first act or so.
item.name: Active Child & Balam Acab @ Brighton Music Hall
